column27:
Solution Description: CoastalConnect IoT – Disaster-Resilient Telecom Mesh
What It Does:
CoastalConnect IoT is a smart telecom system for Bangladesh’s coastal areas, like Khulna. It uses solar-powered 4G stations, Wi-Fi routers, and a Bangla app to keep internet and services running during floods or cyclones and for daily needs like farming and healthcare. IoT sensors track weather and signals, ensuring stable connectivity, while a simple app offers cheap data plans ($0.30 for 500MB) via bKash.

Why It Matters:

Disaster Resilience: Keeps 200,000 people connected during cyclones, saving $20M in losses yearly.
Farming Boost: Helps 50,000 farmers access market prices, increasing income by 10% ($50M/year).
Healthcare Access: Connects 100,000 people to telehealth, cutting medical travel costs by $10M.
How It Works:

Solar 4G Stations: 20 small stations ($3,000 each) with solar panels stay powered during outages.
IoT Sensors: Check water levels and wind to predict disruptions ($150/station).
Wi-Fi Mesh: 200 routers ($30 each) create backup internet during floods.
Smart App: Shows signal status, offers data plans, and stores farming/health tips offline.
Edge Tech: Low-cost devices (Raspberry Pi, $50) process data locally for fast action.
Why It’s Feasible:

Uses Bangladesh’s 60,000 4G towers and 20 million solar users.
Pilot in Khulna costs $100K, funded by UNDP and Teletalk.
Scales to 1M users with local router production (e.g., Walton).
column28: CoastalConnect IoT stands out as a pioneering telecommunications solution uniquely tailored for Bangladesh’s coastal communities, blending solar-powered 4G stations, IoT-driven mesh Wi-Fi, and a Bangla mobile app to deliver resilient connectivity during floods and cyclones while enhancing daily life through farming and telehealth access. Unlike traditional telecom systems, it uses low-cost IoT sensors to predict and adapt to climate disruptions, ensuring uninterrupted internet in vulnerable areas. Its solar-powered mesh network is a novel approach, providing backup connectivity where conventional networks fail. The app’s offline capabilities and voice-driven interface in Bangla make it uniquely inclusive for low-literacy users, while seamless bKash integration offers affordable data plans, empowering coastal farmers and families. Built on Bangladesh’s existing 60,000 4G towers and 20 million solar users, its scalable, cost-effective design sets it apart as a transformative, climate-resilient solution.
column29:
Functionality and Features: CoastalConnect IoT – Disaster-Resilient Telecom Mesh
Functionality:
CoastalConnect IoT provides reliable internet to Bangladesh’s coastal communities, ensuring connectivity during floods and cyclones while supporting daily activities like farming and telehealth. It uses solar-powered 4G micro base stations and Wi-Fi mesh routers to maintain network access, with IoT sensors monitoring weather and signal conditions to prevent outages. A Bangla mobile app offers affordable data plans via bKash, offline farming and health tips, and real-time alerts, designed for low-literacy users in areas like Khulna.
Features:

Solar-Powered 4G Stations: 20 compact stations (360,000 BDT each) with solar panels (24,000 BDT) ensure connectivity during power outages, covering 5km per station.
Wi-Fi Mesh Network: 200 low-cost routers (3,600 BDT each) create a 2km-range backup Wi-Fi network, activated during disruptions.
IoT Sensors: Five sensors per station (18,000 BDT total): two water level (2,400 BDT each), two wind speed (6,000 BDT each), one temperature (1,200 BDT), enabling real-time storm detection.
Edge Processing: Raspberry Pi (6,000 BDT) processes sensor data locally for fast, low-bandwidth decisions in patchy networks.
Bangla Mobile App: User-friendly app with signal maps, 36 BDT/500MB data plans, offline content (farming/health), and voice-based feedback for 30% low-literacy users.
bKash Integration: Seamless payments for affordable data, leveraging 50M users.
Blockchain Logging: Hyperledger Indy ensures transparent network uptime records for operators and regulators.
Offline Mode: 50MB cache for critical content, ensuring access without internet.
SMS Alerts: Bangla alerts for outages, crop prices, and health tips, reaching 90% of mobile users.
column30:
Quality of Technology:
CoastalConnect IoT leverages robust, proven technologies to deliver high-quality, resilient telecommunications for Bangladesh’s coastal communities. The system uses solar-powered 4G micro base stations (360,000 BDT each, 5km range) with IP68 waterproof IoT sensors (18,000 BDT/station) for reliable weather and signal monitoring, ensuring durability in harsh coastal conditions like floods and cyclones. Low-cost Wi-Fi mesh routers (3,600 BDT each) provide seamless backup connectivity, maintaining service during outages with 99% uptime. Edge processing via Raspberry Pi (6,000 BDT) enables fast, low-latency decisions using open-source AI (TensorFlow Lite, 90% prediction accuracy), minimizing dependence on Bangladesh’s patchy rural internet (36.5% penetration). The Bangla mobile app, built on React Native with a 50MB offline cache, ensures accessibility for low-literacy users (30% in rural areas) through a voice-driven interface and low-bandwidth design (<1MB/day). Hyperledger Indy blockchain guarantees transparent, tamper-proof logging of network uptime, enhancing trust and regulatory compliance with BTRC standards. All components are cost-effective, scalable, and aligned with Bangladesh’s 60,000 4G towers and 20 million solar users, ensuring long-term reliability and affordability.
Application of Technology:

Disaster Resilience: IoT sensors (water level, wind speed) and edge AI predict outages, switching to solar-powered mesh Wi-Fi to keep 200,000 users connected during cyclones, saving 2,400M BDT in losses annually.
Agricultural Support: The app delivers offline farming tips (e.g., crop prices, salinity-resistant seeds) via SMS, boosting yields for 50,000 farmers by 10% (6,000M BDT/year), leveraging stable 4G connectivity.
Telehealth Access: Solar-powered 4G enables telehealth video calls, with the app caching health content, connecting 100,000 patients and saving 1,200M BDT in travel costs.
Economic Empowerment: Affordable data plans (36 BDT/500MB via bKash) support SMEs, enhancing market access and adding 6,000M BDT to coastal economies.
Scalable Infrastructure: Integrates with existing telecom and solar infrastructure, piloting in Khulna (12M BDT) to scale nationally.

column25: Agrow is a forward-thinking agricultural technology (AgriTech) company dedicated to revolutionizing the farming sector in Bangladesh. We recognize that while agriculture is the backbone of our economy, its technological adoption has been slow, leaving farmers with inefficient and environmentally taxing methods. Agrow's core mission is to bridge this gap by designing, developing, and manufacturing a new generation of smart agricultural instruments. By integrating the Internet of Things (IoT) and focusing on sustainable, eco-friendly principles, we create tools that enhance productivity, reduce waste, and promote a healthier planet, ensuring that modern technology empowers every farmer.

column27: Our solution is a portfolio of innovative agricultural instruments engineered for the modern era. We don't just build tools; we create intelligent ecosystems that solve specific farming challenges with a focus on sustainability. For instance, our Eco-friendly Hydroponics System utilizes biodegradable farm waste to generate nutrient-rich water, turning a disposal problem into a resource. Our Advanced IoT Incubator gives poultry farmers remote control over temperature and humidity, drastically increasing hatch rates. Furthermore, our Automated Fish Feeder uses a smart system to attract insects, providing a natural, protein-rich, and cost-free food source for aquaculture. Each product is a self-contained solution designed to increase yield while decreasing environmental impact and operational costs.
column28: Agrow's uniqueness lies in our holistic approach to agricultural innovation. While other companies may focus on either software or traditional hardware, we uniquely synthesize three critical elements: practical hardware engineering, smart IoT integration, and a core commitment to ecological sustainability. Our products are not just "smart"—they are fundamentally sustainable by design. The concept of converting biodegradable waste into hydroponic nutrients or using insects for fish feed moves beyond simple automation. It reimagines the farm as a circular ecosystem, reducing reliance on external, costly inputs like fertilizers and commercial feed. This triple-focus on practical tools, intelligent data, and environmental harmony is our key differentiator in the AgriTech landscape.
column29:
Every Agrow instrument is designed for high functionality and user-friendly operation, backed by powerful features:

Eco-friendly Hydroponics: Features a bio-digester that processes organic waste, a sensor network to monitor nutrient levels (pH, EC), and an automated circulation system, creating a self-sustaining food production cycle.

Advanced IoT Incubator: Equipped with real-time temperature and humidity sensors, a connected mobile app for remote monitoring and adjustments, automated egg-turning mechanisms, and predictive alerts to notify farmers of potential issues, ensuring optimal conditions for incubation.

Insect-Based Fish Feeder: Utilizes a low-energy light source to attract insects at optimal times, some sensor to detect water quality, and an automated mechanism to deliver them to the fish, creating a self-regulating, natural feeding system that adapts to the environment.
column30: At Agrow, technology is purposefully applied to deliver quality, efficiency, and sustainability. We leverage the Internet of Things (IoT) by embedding sensors in our instruments to collect critical data—from soil moisture and water pH to incubator humidity and fish feeding activity. This data is transmitted to a central platform or a user's mobile device, enabling remote monitoring and precision control, which minimizes waste and maximizes output. Our application of technology extends to sustainable energy, using solar panels to power devices where possible. By integrating IoT for data-driven decisions and designing hardware that works in harmony with natural processes, we ensure our technology delivers tangible improvements to farm productivity and long-term environmental health.

column27:
The Railway Crack Detection and Image Processing
System provides an innovative and efficient solution to
enhance the reliability and safety of railway infrastructure. For higher sizes of
crack (12mm and 9 mm), zero false detection was achieved
with an error rate of 0%, which shows good detection
performance. At the lower crack size (2 mm), however, the system obtained three false negatives, 39 false positives, and
an error rate of 4.87%. 
By leveraging advanced image processing techniques, the
system autonomously detects cracks and deformations on
railway tracks in real time. The integration of mobile
platforms equipped with cameras, sensors, and GSM enables
the precise identification and categorization of faults, along
with the ability to transmit real-time data, including GSM
coordinates and images, to technicians for immediate action.
This system not only improves the efficiency of maintenance
and monitoring but also reduces human intervention, thereby
lowering inspection costs and minimizing the risk of
accidents.

column25: PorichoyLabs is an innovation-driven research lab focused on building affordable, impactful solutions in renewable energy, education, and digital transformation. Our flagship project SolarShield, boosts solar efficiency by up to 38% through IoT-enabled cooling and cleaning, piloted with BARI and recognized by UNICEF ImaGen Challenge, UIHP, and Orange Corners. Beyond solar, we develop Distractoze, an AI-powered EdTech platform, MonoBook, a smart academic tablet replacing traditional textbooks, and AidChain, a blockchain solution for transparent aid distribution. Through cutting-edge research and real-world pilots, PorichoyLabs is transforming bold ideas into scalable technologies for a sustainable and digital Bangladesh.
column26:

Md. Shakil Mia – Team Member
column27:
SolarShield is an IoT-enabled smart cooling and cleaning system designed to maximize the efficiency and lifespan of solar panels, particularly in Bangladesh’s dusty and hot climate. Solar panels lose up to 38% efficiency due to overheating and dust accumulation, leading to reduced energy yield, higher maintenance costs, and slower return on investment. SolarShield directly addresses these challenges through a modular retrofit kit that combines real-time diagnostics with automated water-based cooling and cleaning.

The system continuously monitors panel temperature, voltage, and performance using sensors connected to an ESP32 controller. When overheating or dust buildup is detected, SolarShield triggers a water pump that cools the panels and simultaneously washes away dust. A built-in rainwater harvesting and recycling mechanism ensures sustainable water use. Users can track system performance via a Bangla-first mobile app and cloud dashboard, enabling real-time alerts, analytics, and remote diagnostics.

Prototype tests show efficiency gains of up to 38%, significantly higher than conventional solutions. SolarShield is already piloted at the Bangladesh Agricultural Research Institute’s 2000W solar plant and multiple 1kW–5kW sites. Recognized by UNICEF ImaGen Challenge, Orange Corners, and UIHP, SolarShield is a scalable, affordable, and impactful solution driving Bangladesh toward sustainable energy independence.
column28:
SolarShield stands out through its intelligent IoT-driven algorithm that determines the optimal timing and frequency for cooling and cleaning, ensuring maximum energy recovery while minimizing water and power use. Unlike conventional systems that operate on fixed schedules, SolarShield dynamically adapts to real-time conditions, making it highly efficient and sustainable.

Additional unique aspects include:

Dual-function system: Simultaneous cooling and cleaning, addressing both heat and dust losses in one solution.

Water sustainability: Built-in rainwater harvesting and recycling system reduces dependence on fresh water—crucial for rural and water-scarce regions.

Retrofit compatibility: Designed as a low-cost, modular add-on, enabling easy adoption on existing solar installations without expensive upgrades.

Localized design: Tailored for Bangladesh’s climate and affordability, with a Bangla-first mobile app and cloud dashboard for accessibility.

Scalable impact: Proven efficiency boost of up to 38%, higher than most international benchmarks, with successful pilots in farms, institutions, and solar plants.

Together, these features make SolarShield not just a monitoring tool but a holistic performance optimization solution, blending IoT intelligence, sustainability, and affordability for the solar industry.
column29:
SolarShield is designed as a smart retrofit solution that continuously monitors and optimizes solar panel performance through IoT and automation. Its key functionalities and features include:

Real-Time Monitoring: Tracks panel temperature, voltage, and efficiency using IoT sensors and ESP32 controller.

Automated Cooling & Cleaning: Intelligent algorithm triggers water flow only when necessary, reducing heat and removing dust simultaneously.

Water Efficiency: Built-in rainwater harvesting and recycling system ensures sustainable use of resources, especially in water-scarce areas.

Mobile App & Cloud Dashboard: Bangla-first user interface with real-time analytics, performance alerts, and remote diagnostics for easy accessibility.

Manual/Automatic Control: Flexible operation mode allowing users to switch between automated triggers and manual activation.

Plug-and-Play Retrofit: Modular kit designed for existing installations, requiring minimal modification and easy deployment at scale.

Energy-Efficient Operation: The system consumes minimal power and runs directly from solar, ensuring self-sufficiency.

White-Labeling & Integration: Supports reseller branding and API integration into EPC installer workflows.

These features make SolarShield a complete performance optimization ecosystem that increases efficiency, reduces maintenance, and extends the lifespan of solar installations.
column30:
SolarShield exemplifies high-quality, locally adapted innovation by integrating proven scientific principles with cutting-edge IoT technology to solve a pressing challenge in Bangladesh’s solar energy sector. The system combines real-time diagnostics, automated water-based cooling and cleaning, and rainwater harvesting—all orchestrated through a modular hardware kit and Firebase-powered mobile dashboard.

Key Technology Highlights:

Precision Monitoring: ESP32-based controller collects live data from temperature and voltage sensors, enabling accurate diagnostics and timely interventions.

Smart Automation: Upon detecting overheating or soiling, the system activates a water pump to cool and clean panels—reducing efficiency loss by up to 38%.

Sustainable Water Use: Rainwater harvesting and recycling mechanisms ensure water-efficient operation, especially critical in rural or water-scarce regions.

Cloud Integration: Firebase backend supports real-time alerts, analytics, and remote control, allowing users to manage installations from anywhere.

User-Centric Design: The mobile app features a clean UI with Bangla-first support, ensuring accessibility for local users and technicians.

Scalability & Compatibility: Retrofit-friendly design allows integration with existing solar setups, while white-labeling and API support enable commercial expansion.

SolarShield’s technology has already been deployed in pilot tests across 1kW to 5kW solar plants, including a 2kW installation at the Bangladesh Agricultural Research Institute. The system has proven its reliability and effectiveness in real-world conditions, demonstrating not just technical feasibility but also market readiness.

By merging hardware innovation with cloud intelligence, SolarShield delivers a transformative leap in solar panel maintenance and performance—setting a new benchmark for smart energy solutions in Bangladesh.

column7: Cross Categories - R & D Project of the Year (CC-RD)
column8: Technology - IOT of the Year (CT-IOT)
column10: Anchor Eye: An IoT and AI-based pisciculture monitoring growth prediction robot
column11: Military Institute of Science and Technology (MIST)
column23: Major General Md Nasim Parvez, BSP, ndc, afwc, psc
column25:
The Military Institute of Science and Technology (MIST) is one of Bangladesh’s premier engineering and technology universities, committed to advancing education, research, and innovation. Established with a vision of excellence, MIST provides world-class academic programs and fosters cutting-edge research across diverse fields of science and engineering. The institute has earned a reputation for producing skilled graduates and pioneering projects that address national and global challenges.

As part of its continuous pursuit of impactful innovation, a student research group at MIST has developed Anchor Eye, an AI- and IoT-powered, cost-effective pisciculture robot designed for the agriculture and aquaculture industry. Anchor Eye combines artificial intelligence with IoT-enabled sensors and robotics to deliver accurate fish growth prediction, enabling farmers to optimize feeding, reduce costs, and increase yield.
column26:
The Anchor Eye Project Team consists of five final-year students from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at the Military Institute of Science and Technology (MIST). The project was developed as our Capstone Project, combining our expertise in artificial intelligence, IoT, and software development. The team members are  Adib Hossain, Alisha Kabir, Rashid Ul Islam, Hafsah Mahzabin Chowdhury, and M. N. Alam Siddiqui.

Anchor Eye represents the culmination of our undergraduate training, reflecting our skills in research, innovation, and practical problem-solving. Together, we created an AI- and IoT-driven pisciculture robot to provide accurate, cost-effective fish growth prediction, enhancing sustainability and efficiency in the aquaculture sector.
column27:
Anchor Eye is an AI- and IoT-powered robotic system designed to make fish farming smarter, more efficient, and cost-effective. The floating robot monitors water quality in real time, measuring pH, temperature, turbidity, dissolved oxygen, and nitrate levels, while a camera captures live images of the fish. Using AI and contour analysis, it calculates fish length, width, and weight with Fulton's Condition Factor, providing accurate growth measurements.

Farmers can control the robot remotely through a mobile app, exploring different parts of the pond and viewing results on a user-friendly dashboard. The system also compares collected data with ideal values and predicts future water conditions and fish growth using machine learning. It provides actionable insights and alerts, helping farmers optimize feeding, maintain water quality, and improve overall yield. All data is stored to refine predictions over time, making the system smarter and more reliable with continued use.

Anchor Eye combines real-time monitoring, intelligent predictions, and practical guidance to give Bangladeshi fish farmers a cost-efficient, sustainable, and hands-on tool for modern aquaculture management.
column28:
Anchor Eye stands out because it brings AI, IoT, and robotics together in a single, practical system for fish farming. It not only monitors water quality in real time, measuring pH, temperature, turbidity, dissolved oxygen, and nitrate levels, but also tracks fish growth, calculates weight using Fulton's Condition Factor, and predicts future pond conditions using machine learning.

Farmers can remotely control the robot, explore different areas of the pond, and receive actionable insights and alerts to optimize feeding, water treatment, and overall pond management. While there is an initial investment, the long-term benefits, such as higher productivity, healthier fish, and reduced costs, far outweigh the cost, making Anchor Eye a cost-efficient and sustainable solution for aquaculture in Bangladesh.
column29:
For detailed demonstration, watch our video: https://youtu.be/YU9aNx9gCw0?si=48KAhKXNrmx8LghB

Real-time water quality monitoring with pH, temperature, and turbidity sensors.

AI-driven fish detection using DNN and contour analysis to measure growth accurately.

Weight calculation for fish using Fulton's Condition Factor based on length and girth.

Remote control of the robot via an intuitive mobile or desktop interface.

User-friendly dashboard displaying fish growth, water quality, and comparison with ideal conditions.

Machine learning predictions for future water quality parameters, including dissolved oxygen and nitrate levels.

Actionable suggestions and alerts to optimize feeding, water treatment, and pond management.

Cost-effective and scalable design, suitable for small- and large-scale aquaculture farms
column30:
Anchor Eye is built to provide reliable, real-time monitoring of fish growth and water quality in ponds. The robot uses sensors to continuously measure pH, temperature, and turbidity, while a camera captures live images of fish. These images are analyzed to calculate length, width, and weight, and the results are compared with ideal growth and water conditions.

The system doesn’t just measur but also predicts future fish growth and water conditions using data collected over time, and provides actionable suggestions, helping farmers make informed decisions. Farmers can control the robot remotely to inspect different areas of their pond, while all data is stored and updated in the database to improve predictions.

By combining continuous monitoring, precise measurement, and practical guidance, Anchor Eye ensures high-quality, actionable insights, making it a robust and scalable solution for aquaculture in Bangladesh.

column7: Cross Categories - R & D Project of the Year (CC-RD)
column8: Technology - AI Technology of the Year (CT-AI)
column25: We are a group of university students passionate about developing innovative solutions in Agriculture using Artificial Intelligence. Our project focuses on supporting farmers with smart digital tools.
column26:
Umme Hani Punam - Team Leader 
Fahim Bin Zaman - Full stack Developer & Reasercher
Anika Zaman - UI & UX designer 
Nukhaiya - Reasercher & Content writer 
Asif Ahmed - AI & ML
column27:
Our platform is a complete digital system built to solve the biggest problems for small farmers by connecting three key services.
First, we provide Predictive Analytics to help farmers make smart and profitable decisions before they even plant. Our system analyzes two key areas: what will grow best and what will sell best. To understand what will grow best, it collects and analyzes data like the farm's one-time baseline soil data (N, P, K), its crop history, real-time weather data for that specific union, and even pictures of crop leaves. This helps determine which crops are best suited for that specific soil, diagnoses diseases, and provides correct fertilizer instructions. At the same time, to figure out what will be most profitable, our AI analyzes past market prices, current market demand, and data from the Ministry of Agriculture. Based on all this information, the system then gives the farmer a simple list of the top three recommended crops, complete with their potential profit and a "Risk Score," ensuring they plant what is not only suitable for their land but also has high market value.

Second, our 
Information Aggregator for logistics works like an "Uber for cold storage" to prevent crops from spoiling after harvest. Cold storage owners can list their empty spaces in our app. A farmer can then easily find a nearby storage location and rent a small amount of space for a short time, for example, space for just 20 crates of vegetables for 3 days. A dynamic pricing algorithm helps set fair rental prices based on demand, reducing costs in the off-season to ensure maximum use of storage facilities.



Finally, our F2B Marketplace connects these farmers directly to big buyers. We do this through our "Digital Co-operative" model, which automatically groups small farmers together. When a large order comes in from a buyer like a supermarket, our AI automatically divides that order among the farmers in the group based on their production ability and quality score. To ensure trust and fair pricing, this is where our 
AI-Powered Quality Assurance comes in. Using cameras and AI software, the system automatically grades produce into "Grade A," "Grade B," or "Grade C" based on size, color, and blemishes, eliminating any chance of human bias. This ensures that buyers receive the exact quality they paid for, building confidence in the marketplace. . When a large order comes in from a buyer like a supermarket, our AI automatically divides that order among the farmers in the group based on their production ability and quality score
 Once the deal is confirmed, the farmer can receive an instant loan of up to 80% of the order's value from our financial partners. This advance cash helps the farmer cover costs, including transportation. The platform also arranges transport automatically; once a deal is final, a trip request is created, and truck drivers bid for the job. The system automatically gives the job to the lowest bidder, making transport cheap and efficient
column28:
Three services combined in one: crop forecasting, storage solution, and direct market access.
First-ever platform in Bangladesh to connect farmers, storage, transport, and buyers on a single digital platform.
Has "Risk Score" for crops so farmers can choose safer and more profitable ones.
QR-based tracking so buyers can see the exact source of the food.
Provides instant small loans to farmers once there is an order from a buyer.
column29:
Local weather forecast for irrigation and harvesting.
Crop suggestion with profit and risk score.
AI crop and soil health testing.
Real-time pricing cold storage leasing platform.
Farmers clustering to complete bulk orders.
Product tracking using QR codes.
Auto-grading of crops using AI (A/B/C grade).
Transport vehicles smart allocation.
Escrow payment for secure transaction.
Authenticated users (sellers, farmers, transporters).
column30:
Machine learning for weather, crop price, and soil testing.
Leaf disease detection and crop grading using computer vision.
Farmer, owner, and buyer web and mobile application.
Blockchain-based open tracking of products.
Escrow payment and NID verification for security and trust.
Feedback loop so the system improves with more data.

column25:
About FIT NATION
Welcome to FIT NATION!
Founded in July 2023, FIT NATION is more than just a sports organization — it’s a movement. Through our marathons and fitness initiatives, we champion Health & Wellbeing (SDG 3) while also fostering Learning, Awareness, and Empowerment (SDG 4). Based in Dhaka, Bangladesh, we have quickly emerged as a leading force in organizing events that connect people, inspire healthier lifestyles, and strengthen communities. With every step, FIT NATION is driving positive change — one run, one goal, one nation at a time. FIT NATION is proud to be a sister concern of Inspiring Bangladesh Ltd.
column26:
To create a future where fitness is a way of life, communities thrive in good health, and every individual is empowered with knowledge and opportunities. We envision a nation that advances the spirit of Health & Wellbeing (SDG 3) and Quality Education (SDG 4) — paving the way for a stronger and more sustainable tomorrow.
Team lead by Imran Fahad, A startup community leader focusing health & wellbeing.

column6: An AI-driven EdTech solution that personalizes university admission prep in Bangladesh through diagnostics, adaptive learning, and gamified tutoring. It is making quality education affordable and accessible for all students.
column7: Cross Categories - Start- Up of the Year (CC-SU)
column8: Technology - AI Technology of the Year (CT-AI)
column25: Sohopathi AI is an AI-powered learning platform designed to solve the fragmented, costly, and unequal university admission preparation system in Bangladesh. By combining personalized diagnostics, adaptive learning modes, and affordable access, Sohopathi AI empowers every student regardless of location or financial background. It helps a student to prepare smarter and succeed in competitive exams.
column26: Our team consists of passionate educators, AI engineers, and product designers with deep experience in EdTech and a shared mission to democratize access to quality education. Together, we bring expertise in machine learning, curriculum design, and mobile-first product development tailored for Bangladeshi students.
column27:
SohopathiAI provides:
AI-Powered Diagnostic Test that identifies weak topics and builds a personalized roadmap.
Multi-Mode Learning: Simplest Explanation Mode, Fun Learning Mode (gamified quizzes), and Tutor Simulation Mode.
Affordable Access: Unlimited learning for just ৳499/month, replacing costly coaching centers and guidebooks.
column28:
Localized Focus: Built specifically for Bangladesh’s 83+ admission exams.
AI Personalization: Tailored learning paths vs. generic content from competitors.
10× Cost Advantage: Mass adoption possible at a fraction of traditional coaching costs.
Accessibility: Mobile-first design ensures rural and semi-urban students are not left behind.
column29:
Personalized diagnostics and adaptive learning.
Gamified, interactive quizzes for engagement.
AI tutor simulation for step-by-step guidance.
Mobile-first platform accessible anytime, anywhere.
column30: SohopathiAI leverages advanced AI algorithms for diagnostics, personalization, and adaptive learning. The platform ensures high-quality, scalable, and reliable performance, delivering a seamless learning experience even in low-resource environments.

column25: আমার নিজস্ব কোন কম্পানি নাই,উপজেলার তথ্য সংক্রান্ত সমস্যা ও আধুনিক উপজেলা তৈরি করার লক্ষ্যে অ্যাপ্লিকেশনটি তৈরি করেছি।
column26:
টিমের নাম:বেতাগী ই-সেবা।
মেম্বার ১: 
নাম:মোঃ আবদুল্লাহ আল হোসাইন(টিম লিডার)
শ্রেণি:দশম
যোগাযোগ নম্বর:01714739941
মেম্বার ২:
নাম:জাওয়াদ নুর তাহিম
শ্রেণি:দশম
যোগাযোগ নম্বর:+8801712950124
column27:
“বেতাগী ই-সেবা” শুধুমাত্র একটি অ্যাপ নয়, বরং এটি আধুনিক ও স্বচ্ছ বেতাগীর স্বপ্নকে বাস্তবে রূপ দেওয়ার একটি উদ্যোগ।

এই অ্যাপের মাধ্যমে নাগরিকরা সহজে সরকারি ও বেসরকারি গুরুত্বপূর্ণ তথ্য যেমন—কর্মকর্তাদের তথ্য, দোকানপাট ও ব্যবসা প্রতিষ্ঠানের তথ্য, জনপ্রতিনিধিদের প্রোফাইল ইত্যাদি এক জায়গায় পাবেন।

এখানে নাগরিকরা যেকোনো সময় উপজেলা নির্বাহী কর্মকর্তা (UNO), চেয়ারম্যান বা সংশ্লিষ্ট ব্যক্তির কাছে অভিযোগ করতে পারবেন। প্রয়োজনে নাম গোপন রেখেও অভিযোগ দাখিল করা যাবে। একইসাথে নাগরিকরা সরাসরি কর্মকর্তাদের বা প্রতিনিধিদের কাছে প্রয়োজনীয় তথ্য পাঠাতেও সক্ষম হবেন।

অ্যাপটিতে দুর্নীতি প্রতিরোধী একটি বিশেষ ফিচার সংযোজন করা হয়েছে, যেখানে সরকারি প্রকল্পের বিস্তারিত তথ্য (ব্যয়, অগ্রগতি, অনুমোদনকারী কর্মকর্তা, ঠিকাদার ইত্যাদি) পাওয়া যাবে। নাগরিকরা চাইলে প্রকল্প নিয়ে তাদের অসন্তোষ বা মতামত জানাতে পারবেন, যা সরাসরি উপজেলা নির্বাহী কর্মকর্তার নিকট পৌঁছাবে। এটি স্বচ্ছতা ও জবাবদিহিতা নিশ্চিত করবে।

ভবিষ্যতে এখানে যুব ও ভলান্টিয়ারদের সহযোগিতায় মাদকবিরোধী কার্যক্রম পরিচালনা করার ফিচারও যুক্ত করা হবে।

আমাদের লক্ষ্য, বেতাগীতে এই প্রজেক্ট সফল হলে তা সারা দেশের জন্য একটি মডেল ই-সেবা প্ল্যাটফর্ম হিসেবে বাস্তবায়ন করা।
column28:
“বেতাগী ই-সেবা” এর বিশেষত্ব হলো এটি শুধু তথ্যভিত্তিক অ্যাপ নয়, বরং নাগরিক অংশগ্রহণ, স্বচ্ছতা ও জবাবদিহিতা নিশ্চিত করার একটি পূর্ণাঙ্গ ডিজিটাল প্ল্যাটফর্ম।

🔹 এখানে নাগরিকরা শুধু তথ্য পাবেন না, বরং সরাসরি অভিযোগ করতে পারবেন, তা চাইলে নাম গোপন রেখেও।
🔹 সরকারি প্রকল্পের ব্যয়, অগ্রগতি, অনুমোদনকারী কর্মকর্তা ও ঠিকাদারের তথ্য প্রকাশ করে দুর্নীতি প্রতিরোধে সহায়ক ভূমিকা রাখবে।
🔹 স্থানীয় সমস্যা যেমন—মাদক নিয়ন্ত্রণে যুব সমাজকে যুক্ত করার পরিকল্পনা রয়েছে, যা অন্য কোনো স্থানীয় ই-সেবা অ্যাপে নেই।
🔹 এটি প্রথমবারের মতো একটি উপজেলা স্তরে “One-Stop E-Service & Accountability Platform” হিসেবে তৈরি হচ্ছে, যা ভবিষ্যতে সারাদেশে প্রয়োগযোগ্য।
column29:
“বেতাগী ই-সেবা” অ্যাপটি একটি One-Stop Digital Service Platform, যেখানে নাগরিকরা একসাথে সরকারি, স্বাস্থ্য, বাণিজ্যিক ও সামাজিক সব ধরনের তথ্য ও সেবা পাবেন। এর মূল ফিচারগুলো হলো:

1️⃣ স্বাস্থ্য সেবা:

উপজেলা ডাক্তার, গাইনি বিশেষজ্ঞ, দন্ত বিশেষজ্ঞ, অর্থোপেডিক, শিশু বিশেষজ্ঞ, মনোরোগ বিশেষজ্ঞ, চক্ষু বিশেষজ্ঞ, নাক-কান-গলা বিশেষজ্ঞ, মেডিসিন, নিউরোলজিস্ট, চর্মরোগ, হৃদরোগ বিশেষজ্ঞসহ বিভিন্ন চিকিৎসক প্রোফাইল।

পশু চিকিৎসক, নার্স, ফার্মেসি, অ্যাম্বুলেন্স সার্ভিস ও ব্লাড ডোনার লিস্ট।

ক্লিনিক ও হাসপাতালের তথ্য সহজলভ্য।


2️⃣ ব্যবসা ও সেবা খাত:

হোটেল, রেস্টুরেন্ট, কুরিয়ার সার্ভিস, ব্যাংক, বিউটি পার্লার, নার্সারি দোকান, মুদি দোকান, ফার্নিচার, ইট-সিমেন্ট, ইলেকট্রনিক্স, জুয়েলার্স ও অনলাইন সার্ভিস।

কোচিং সেন্টার, প্রশিক্ষণ কেন্দ্র ও বিয়ের ঘটক সম্পর্কিত তথ্য।


3️⃣ পেশাগত ও কারিগরি সেবা:

দলিল লেখক, সার্ভেয়ার, কাঠমিস্ত্রী, রাজমিস্ত্রী, রং মিস্ত্রী, গাড়ি মেকার, ইলেকট্রনিক্স মেকার ও দর্জি কারিগরদের তথ্য।


4️⃣ নিরাপত্তা ও প্রশাসনিক সহায়তা:

উপজেলা পুলিশ, ফায়ার সার্ভিস, সাংবাদিক ও জনপ্রতিনিধিদের তথ্য।

সরাসরি অভিযোগ দাখিল ও তথ্য পাঠানোর সুযোগ ইত্যাদি।

column7: Cross Categories - Start- Up of the Year (CC-SU)
column8: Technology - AI Technology of the Year (CT-AI)
column11: Free Academy Course (Solo Project by Md Shahinur Rahman)
column25: Free Academy Course is a one-person educational technology initiative founded in 2025 by Md Shahinur Rahman. The platform was built independently with a mission to provide free, accessible education for everyone, especially students who cannot afford paid platforms. Through this project, Shahinur aims to break down financial and geographical barriers to learning.
column26: There is no team – this project is entirely developed, designed, and maintained by one person, Md Shahinur Rahman. From coding to content creation, everything is handled independently, using open-source tools and a strong personal commitment to social impact.
column27: Free Academy Course is a free Ed-Tech platform offering AI-supported digital education to learners in Bangladesh. The platform hosts online courses in Bangla and English, covering key skills like programming, digital literacy, and job-readiness. Built entirely by one person, it is mobile-optimized and supports low-bandwidth access.
column28: Unlike large commercial Ed-Tech companies, this project is non-profit, built by a single individual, and entirely free. It focuses on local needs with a Bangladeshi perspective, offers bilingual content, and uses AI to make learning paths personalized. It proves how one person can make a difference using technology.
column29:
AI-driven course recommendation
Bangla & English content
Free access, no ads or charges
Course certificates
Mobile-first design
Lightweight and low-data usage
Quizzes and progress tracking
Easy-to-use dashboard
column30: Built with modern web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js) and integrated with AI models for personalizing learning. Despite being a solo project, it matches the functionality of bigger platforms. The site is responsive, secure, and built for future scaling.

column27:
“বেতাগী ই-সেবা” শুধুমাত্র একটি অ্যাপ নয়, বরং এটি আধুনিক ও স্বচ্ছ বেতাগীর স্বপ্নকে বাস্তবে রূপ দেওয়ার একটি উদ্যোগ।

এই অ্যাপের মাধ্যমে নাগরিকরা সহজে সরকারি ও বেসরকারি গুরুত্বপূর্ণ তথ্য যেমন—কর্মকর্তাদের তথ্য, দোকানপাট ও ব্যবসা প্রতিষ্ঠানের তথ্য, জনপ্রতিনিধিদের প্রোফাইল ইত্যাদি এক জায়গায় পাবেন।

এখানে নাগরিকরা যেকোনো সময় উপজেলা নির্বাহী কর্মকর্তা (UNO), চেয়ারম্যান বা সংশ্লিষ্ট ব্যক্তির কাছে অভিযোগ করতে পারবেন। প্রয়োজনে নাম গোপন রেখেও অভিযোগ দাখিল করা যাবে। একইসাথে নাগরিকরা সরাসরি কর্মকর্তাদের বা প্রতিনিধিদের কাছে প্রয়োজনীয় তথ্য পাঠাতেও সক্ষম হবেন।

অ্যাপটিতে দুর্নীতি প্রতিরোধী একটি বিশেষ ফিচার সংযোজন করা হয়েছে, যেখানে সরকারি প্রকল্পের বিস্তারিত তথ্য (ব্যয়, অগ্রগতি, অনুমোদনকারী কর্মকর্তা, ঠিকাদার ইত্যাদি) পাওয়া যাবে। নাগরিকরা চাইলে প্রকল্প নিয়ে তাদের অসন্তোষ বা মতামত জানাতে পারবেন, যা সরাসরি উপজেলা নির্বাহী কর্মকর্তার নিকট পৌঁছাবে। এটি স্বচ্ছতা ও জবাবদিহিতা নিশ্চিত করবে।

ভবিষ্যতে এখানে যুব ও ভলান্টিয়ারদের সহযোগিতায় মাদকবিরোধী কার্যক্রম পরিচালনা করার ফিচারও যুক্ত করা হবে।

আমাদের লক্ষ্য, বেতাগীতে এই প্রজেক্ট সফল হলে তা সারা দেশের জন্য একটি মডেল ই-সেবা প্ল্যাটফর্ম হিসেবে বাস্তবায়ন করা।
column28:
“বেতাগী ই-সেবা” এর বিশেষত্ব হলো এটি শুধু তথ্যভিত্তিক অ্যাপ নয়, বরং নাগরিক অংশগ্রহণ, স্বচ্ছতা ও জবাবদিহিতা নিশ্চিত করার একটি পূর্ণাঙ্গ ডিজিটাল প্ল্যাটফর্ম।

🔹 এখানে নাগরিকরা শুধু তথ্য পাবেন না, বরং সরাসরি অভিযোগ করতে পারবেন, তা চাইলে নাম গোপন রেখেও।
🔹 সরকারি প্রকল্পের ব্যয়, অগ্রগতি, অনুমোদনকারী কর্মকর্তা ও ঠিকাদারের তথ্য প্রকাশ করে দুর্নীতি প্রতিরোধে সহায়ক ভূমিকা রাখবে।
🔹 স্থানীয় সমস্যা যেমন—মাদক নিয়ন্ত্রণে যুব সমাজকে যুক্ত করার পরিকল্পনা রয়েছে, যা অন্য কোনো স্থানীয় ই-সেবা অ্যাপে নেই।
🔹 এটি প্রথমবারের মতো একটি উপজেলা স্তরে “One-Stop E-Service & Accountability Platform” হিসেবে তৈরি হচ্ছে, যা ভবিষ্যতে সারাদেশে প্রয়োগযোগ্য।
column29:
“বেতাগী ই-সেবা” অ্যাপটি একটি One-Stop Digital Service Platform, যেখানে নাগরিকরা একসাথে সরকারি, স্বাস্থ্য, বাণিজ্যিক ও সামাজিক সব ধরনের তথ্য ও সেবা পাবেন। এর মূল ফিচারগুলো হলো:

1️⃣ স্বাস্থ্য সেবা:

উপজেলা ডাক্তার, গাইনি বিশেষজ্ঞ, দন্ত বিশেষজ্ঞ, অর্থোপেডিক, শিশু বিশেষজ্ঞ, মনোরোগ বিশেষজ্ঞ, চক্ষু বিশেষজ্ঞ, নাক-কান-গলা বিশেষজ্ঞ, মেডিসিন, নিউরোলজিস্ট, চর্মরোগ, হৃদরোগ বিশেষজ্ঞসহ বিভিন্ন চিকিৎসক প্রোফাইল।

পশু চিকিৎসক, নার্স, ফার্মেসি, অ্যাম্বুলেন্স সার্ভিস ও ব্লাড ডোনার লিস্ট।

ক্লিনিক ও হাসপাতালের তথ্য সহজলভ্য।


2️⃣ ব্যবসা ও সেবা খাত:

হোটেল, রেস্টুরেন্ট, কুরিয়ার সার্ভিস, ব্যাংক, বিউটি পার্লার, নার্সারি দোকান, মুদি দোকান, ফার্নিচার, ইট-সিমেন্ট, ইলেকট্রনিক্স, জুয়েলার্স ও অনলাইন সার্ভিস।

কোচিং সেন্টার, প্রশিক্ষণ কেন্দ্র ও বিয়ের ঘটক সম্পর্কিত তথ্য।


3️⃣ পেশাগত ও কারিগরি সেবা:

দলিল লেখক, সার্ভেয়ার, কাঠমিস্ত্রী, রাজমিস্ত্রী, রং মিস্ত্রী, গাড়ি মেকার, ইলেকট্রনিক্স মেকার ও দর্জি কারিগরদের তথ্য।


4️⃣ নিরাপত্তা ও প্রশাসনিক সহায়তা:

উপজেলা পুলিশ, ফায়ার সার্ভিস, সাংবাদিক ও জনপ্রতিনিধিদের তথ্য।

সরাসরি অভিযোগ দাখিল ও তথ্য পাঠানোর সুযোগ ইত্যাদি।

column26: In my team I am alone . A student of class 11 in Adamjee Cantonment College.
column27:
Nagorik App – Overall Solution Description

Nagorik App is a comprehensive citizen-centric mobile platform (PWA) designed to address the most critical challenges faced by people in Bangladesh, from emergency response to healthcare, government services, and public information, all in one secure and accessible application. The app’s purpose is to save lives, streamline citizen services, and enhance transparency, fully aligned with Digital Bangladesh 2030 goals.

Core Features & Solutions:

1. Emergency Services:

Citizens can instantly contact police, fire brigade, or ambulance by tapping a single button.

The app automatically sends the current GPS location and the citizen’s profile to the nearest authority.

The authority’s dashboard shows a zoomable map with the user’s location, allowing fast response.

Example: A child is trapped in a house fire. The citizen taps the fire brigade button; the nearest fire station receives the alert with location, rushes immediately, and saves the child’s life.



2. Healthcare Services:

Online & offline doctor appointments with AI-assisted suggestions for the right doctor category (e.g., cardiologist, ophthalmologist).

Video consultation via Jitsi API.

Prescriptions, test recommendations, and appointment summaries delivered as QR codes for easy verification and printing at government hospitals.

Example: A citizen in a rural district needs a cardiologist. AI suggests the correct specialist, schedules a video call, and sends a QR code for lab tests and medicines.



3. Government Services & Citizen Engagement:

Tax calculator and payment instructions based on Bangladeshi law.

Updates on government job circulars, GDP/GNP, national budget, and commodity prices.

Anonymous complaint system to report corruption, development issues, or civic problems, routed to the relevant authority.

Example: A citizen notices road construction delays and files a complaint anonymously. The concerned mayor’s office receives it for action.



4. Portal System for Authorities:

Dedicated portals for Police, Fire Brigade, Hospitals, Online Doctors, Anti-Corruption Authority, Mayor Office, Tax Authority.

Secure unique ID + password authentication ensures only authorized personnel can access their dashboards.



5. Data Privacy & Security:

All personal data (NID, phone numbers, location) stored securely via Supabase.

Citizens control when location is shared; GPS only shared during emergencies.

All AI interactions (doctor suggestions, symptom analysis) are fully offline or free-to-use APIs, ensuring no cost limitations.



6. User Interface & Accessibility:

Default Bangla language with a floating toggle to switch to English.

Intuitive dashboards with notification lists, maps, QR codes, appointment schedules, and emergency history.



7. Impact & Sustainability:

Reduces emergency response time, increases citizen access to healthcare, improves transparency, and supports Digital Bangladesh 2030.

Subscription model ensures sustainable revenue.

Opens employment opportunities for doctors, administrative staff, and IT professionals.
column28:
Uniqueness / Key Differentiators of Nagorik App

1. All-in-One Citizen Solution:

Unlike typical apps that focus on a single service (health, emergency, or government info), Nagorik App combines emergency response, healthcare, government services, and citizen engagement in a single platform.



2. Real-Time Emergency Response with Location Tracking:

The app automatically identifies the nearest police, fire brigade, or ambulance, sends the citizen’s GPS location, and provides a zoomable map to authorities. Few apps in Bangladesh provide this automated emergency routing.



3. AI-Assisted Doctor Selection & Appointments:

AI suggests the correct doctor based on symptoms and schedules online or offline appointments. Integrates video calls, prescriptions, and QR-based test/medicine workflow.
5. Anonymous Civic Complaints & Government Integration:

Citizens can report corruption, civic issues, or development needs anonymously. The complaints are automatically routed to the relevant authority.



6. Offline/Online Healthcare Workflow with Secure QR Codes:

Online prescriptions, test orders, and appointment data are QR-encoded, printable in hospitals, reducing errors and fraud.



7. Scalable & Secure Infrastructure:

Built with Loveable PWA, Supabase, free APIs (LocationIQ, GPT-4All, Jitsi), ensuring low cost, high scalability, and security.




In short: Nagorik App is the first fully integrated, AI-assisted, real-time citizen service app in Bangladesh that can handle emergencies, healthcare, government services, and civic engagement—all in one secure and accessible platform.
column29:
Functionality:

Emergency Response: Instantly notifies nearest police, fire brigade, or ambulance with real-time GPS location of the citizen.

Healthcare Services: AI-assisted doctor selection, scheduling online/offline appointments, video consultations, and secure QR-based prescriptions/tests.

Government Services: Tax calculator, government job circulars, GDP/Budget updates, and commodity prices.

Citizen Engagement: Anonymous complaints about corruption, civic issues, or development routed to relevant authorities.

Language Toggle: Default Bangla with an optional English toggle for accessibility.

Dashboards: Authority-specific dashboards (Police, Fire, Hospital, Online Doctors) for managing tasks efficiently.



---

Features:

1. All-in-One Platform – Emergencies, healthcare, government info, and citizen complaints in one app.


2. AI Symptom Analysis – Suggests the correct doctor from 16 types based on symptoms.


3. Real-Time Location Sharing – Nearest emergency service notified automatically.


4. Secure Data Management – Personal data stored safely; QR codes for prescriptions and tests.


5. Offline/Online Appointments – Doctors and citizens see scheduled appointments and missed appointments.


6. Anonymous Reporting – Citizens can safely report issues without revealing identity.


7. Subscription Model – Ensures sustainable maintenance and revenue.


8. Multilingual – Fully Bangla with an English toggle for flexibility.
column30:
Quality and Application of Technology

Nagorik App leverages modern, reliable, and cost-effective technologies to deliver a scalable, secure, and citizen-centric platform:

1. Progressive Web App (PWA) – Runs smoothly on mobile devices without requiring installation, ensuring accessibility across Bangladesh.


2. Supabase – Provides secure cloud database and authentication for storing citizen profiles and emergency data.


3. LocationIQ API – Detects real-time GPS locations of citizens and finds the nearest emergency services automatically.


4. Jitsi API – Facilitates free, high-quality video consultations between doctors and patients.


5. GPT-4All – AI analyzes symptoms and recommends the right doctor category, making healthcare smarter and faster.


6. QR Code System – Digital prescriptions and test recommendations are delivered as QR codes, printable at government hospitals, reducing errors and fraud.


7. Multilingual Support – Default Bangla interface with optional English toggle for wider accessibility.



Impact of Technology:

Automates emergency notifications and doctor recommendations.

Improves healthcare access in rural and urban areas.

Enhances transparency and citizen engagement in government services.

Reduces delays and errors in official documentation through QR-based verification.


In short: Nagorik App uses modern web technologies, AI, and location services in an integrated way to save lives, improve government efficiency, and empower citizens.

column27: RideGuardian by InnoSphere is an innovative IoT-based safety solution that automatically detects vehicle crashes and instantly sends an emergency alert with GPS location via SMS to pre-set contacts and hospitals. Using an MPU6050 sensor for impact detection, NEO-6M GPS for precise tracking, and SIM800L GSM module for communication, the system ensures immediate response during road accidents. Designed for both helmet-integrated and portable use, this low-cost, energy-efficient device aims to save lives by bridging the critical communication gap between accident occurrence and emergency assistance — because every second saves a life.
column28: The project is unique because it works automatically without any smartphone or internet. It uses sensors, GPS, and GSM to detect real accidents and send instant emergency messages with location. To avoid false alarms, it follows a two-step check — first, it senses a strong impact, then it confirms if the motion stays unstable for a few seconds before sending alerts. Its portable and helmet versions make it usable for all riders, and its low cost and energy-saving design make it perfect for developing countries like Bangladesh.
column29: The RideGuardian project detects accidents automatically using motion and impact sensors (MPU6050). To reduce false alerts, it uses a two-step verification process: first, the sensor checks if acceleration exceeds the crash threshold; second, a short confirmation delay ensures the event is not a minor bump. Once a real crash is confirmed, it triggers a buzzer alert, fetches the GPS location, and sends an SMS to an emergency contact. If GPS fix isn’t available within 10 seconds, it still sends a basic accident alert. After a 30-second delay, the system resets for the next detection.
column30:
•	Accident Detection: Uses MPU6050 sensors to detect crashes with a two-step verification process to reduce false alerts (threshold check + short confirmation delay).
	•	Immediate Alert: Triggers a buzzer and sends an SMS to an emergency contact with a Google Maps link of the location.
	•	GPS Backup: If GPS fix isn’t available within 10 seconds, sends a basic accident alert.
	•	Automatic Reset: Resets after 30 seconds for the next detection.
	•	Reliable & Compact: Lightweight, robust, and user-friendly design.
	•	Practical Application: Enhances personal safety for motorcyclists, cyclists, and wearable safety devices; demonstrates integration of IoT, GPS, and sensors for real-time emergency response.

column27: The Student Hub is a one-stop digital platform designed to support DIU students throughout their entire university journey. It brings together academic services, club activities, mental health support, career opportunities, and student feedback into a single system. Whether it’s orientation, skill development, or finding on-campus jobs, the Student Hub ensures that every student can access the right resources at the right time.
column28:
Unlike traditional university portals, the Student Hub is not just an information system—it is an engagement and growth platform.
It connects academic, personal, and professional development in one place.
It combines AI-driven analysis, automation, and real-time data for student success.
It integrates psychology support, job opportunities, clubs, and feedback systems—something rarely seen in other universities.
column29:
Key features of the Student Hub include:
Orientation Program Module – Helps new students adapt quickly.
Club Automation – Full digital support for student clubs and events.
Psychology Service Center – Access to counseling, chatbot support, and mental health resources.
Job Hub – Learn & Earn – On-campus job opportunities and projects.
Proctor Module – Real-time student monitoring and academic support.
Student Analysis & Roadmap – Track performance and skill growth.
Student Profile – Build employability through a 360° student profile.
Feedback & Suggestions – Share ideas to improve DIU services.
column30:
The Student Hub uses modern web and mobile technologies, AI-powered chatbots, real-time data analytics, and automated workflows. Its design ensures:
Scalability – can handle thousands of students simultaneously.
Accessibility – available on both website and mobile app.
Security – student data is protected through advanced encryption and secure login.
User-Friendly Design – simple, easy-to-use, and fully student-centric.

column27: The “Guardian on Board” system offers a comprehensive IoT-based solution designed to ensure student transportation safety, efficiency, and transparency. It integrates NFC, GPS, and MQTT technologies to create a real-time monitoring and communication ecosystem between schools, transportation staff, and parents. Each student is provided with an NFC-enabled ID card, which they tap on an NFC POS device while boarding or leaving the bus. The device immediately transmits this data, including the student’s identity, time, and location, to the cloud server using the MQTT protocol. This triggers instant notifications to parents through the Guardian mobile application, informing them when their child boards or exits the bus. Simultaneously, GPS tracking enables live monitoring of bus routes, allowing both parents and administrators to view the vehicle’s location and estimated arrival time. The driver and conductor application facilitates attendance logging and communication, while the web-based management portal enables administrators to register students and buses, assign routes, track daily operations, and analyse data for better decision-making. By combining IoT devices, lightweight MQTT communication, and synchronised cloud databases, the “Guardian on Board” system effectively enhances student safety, minimises communication delays, automates attendance, and optimises route management, offering a smart, dependable, and user-friendly transportation management experience.
column28: The “Guardian on Board” system is a unique IoT-based student transportation solution that ensures safety, transparency, and efficiency. It combines NFC, GPS, and MQTT technologies to create real-time communication between schools, drivers, and parents. Each student uses an NFC ID card to record boarding and drop-off, instantly sending data to the cloud and notifying parents. The GPS tracking allows live route monitoring, while the web portal helps administrators manage buses, routes, and attendance. By integrating smart automation and instant alerts, “Guardian on Board” offers a modern, reliable, and efficient way to make student transportation safer and more connected.
column29: The “Guardian on Board” system offers smart and reliable features for safe student transportation. It provides real-time GPS tracking, NFC-based student check-in, and instant parent notifications for boarding and drop-off events. The driver app manages attendance and routes, while the web dashboard lets administrators monitor buses, assign routes, and analyse data. With automated attendance, live alerts, and route management, the system ensures safer, more efficient, and transparent student transportation.
column30: The “Guardian on Board” system ensures high quality and reliability through the effective use of modern technologies. It integrates IoT devices, NFC cards, and GPS tracking to deliver accurate, real-time data. The use of the MQTT communication protocol enables fast, lightweight, and secure message transmission between devices and servers. Cloud-based data management ensures smooth synchronisation across the mobile apps and web dashboard. Together, these technologies create a robust, scalable, and efficient platform that enhances student safety, streamlines operations, and provides real-time visibility for parents and schools.

column27:
The Individual Water Billing System for Residential Buildings provides a smart and efficient solution for monitoring and managing water consumption at the household level. Traditional water billing systems often rely on manual meter readings and shared billing methods, which can lead to inaccurate usage records, delayed billing, and unfair cost distribution among residents. To overcome these limitations, our system integrates IoT technology, smart water meters, and a centralized cloud platform to automate the entire billing process.

Each apartment or household is equipped with a digital flow sensor that measures real-time water usage. The collected data is transmitted wirelessly to a central server through Wi-Fi or GSM modules, where it is processed and stored. The system then automatically calculates individual water bills based on actual consumption and predefined tariff rates. Users can access their water usage data and billing information through a web or mobile dashboard, which also provides insights into daily, weekly, or monthly consumption patterns.

This solution ensures transparency, accuracy, and convenience by eliminating manual readings and enabling data-driven decision-making. It promotes water conservation by allowing residents to monitor their consumption habits and helps building management authorities ensure fair billing, efficient maintenance, and sustainable resource management.
column28: The Individual Water Billing System for Residential Buildings stands out for its smart, automated, and data-driven approach to managing water consumption. Unlike traditional systems that rely on shared meters or manual readings, this project uses IoT-based smart water meters and a cloud-connected billing platform to record and calculate usage in real time. Each household receives an accurate bill based solely on its own consumption, ensuring fairness and transparency. The system’s automated data collection, instant bill generation, and remote monitoring capabilities reduce human error and administrative effort. Its integration of real-time analytics and user dashboards empowers both residents and management to track usage trends, detect leaks early, and promote water conservation. This unique combination of automation, precision, and sustainability makes the project a modern, efficient, and environmentally responsible solution for residential water management.
column29: The Individual Water Billing System for Residential Buildings offers a range of smart functionalities and user-friendly features designed to improve accuracy, transparency, and efficiency in water management. The system enables real-time monitoring of water consumption for each household through IoT-enabled digital flow meters, ensuring precise measurement of usage. It features automatic data transmission to a central server, eliminating the need for manual meter readings. The automated billing system calculates individual water bills based on actual consumption and predefined tariff rates. Users can access a web or mobile dashboard to view live consumption data, payment history, and usage analytics. Additional features include usage trend analysis, and monthly report generation for both residents and management authorities. Together, these functionalities make the system efficient, transparent, and eco-friendly, promoting responsible water usage and fair cost distribution.
column30: The Individual Water Billing System for Residential Buildings ensures high quality and reliability through the effective application of IoT and automation technologies. It uses smart water flow sensors to collect accurate consumption data in real time, eliminating errors from manual readings. The data is transmitted securely via Wi-Fi or GSM modules to a cloud-based server, where it is processed and stored for analysis and billing. The use of automated billing algorithms ensures precise and fair calculation for each household, while the web and mobile interfaces provide easy access to information for both residents and management. This integration of IoT, cloud computing, and real-time analytics results in a highly efficient, scalable, and sustainable solution that enhances transparency, supports smart city initiatives, and promotes responsible water usage.

column8: Technology - IOT of the Year (CT-IOT)
column11: Aqua Sense – Smart IoT & AI-Powered Aquaculture Platform
column25:
Aqua Sense is an innovative agri-tech startup dedicated to empowering fish farmers through smart technology. We combine IoT, AI, and drone-based solutions to optimize fish farming, increase productivity, and promote sustainable water resource management in Bangladesh.

Vision:
To transform traditional fish farming into a data-driven, efficient, and sustainable practice, ensuring healthy water, healthy fish, and increased farmer income.

Mission:
	•	Provide real-time water quality monitoring and actionable insights for farmers.
	•	Recommend optimal fish stocking density, species, and feed using AI-based analytics.
	•	Enable farmers to maximize pond productivity, reduce waste, and increase profitability.
	•	Promote sustainable aquaculture practices in line with SDGs 2, 12, 13, and 14.

Core Offerings:
	•	IoT-based water quality sensors for continuous monitoring
	•	AI-powered fish stocking and feed recommendations
	•	Mobile app and website for farmer guidance and data visualization
	•	Drone-assisted pond surveillance for real-time assessment

Impact:
Aqua Sense empowers rural communities by turning underutilized water bodies into productive farms, enhancing food security, boosting incomes, and reducing environmental impact.
column26:
SM Naim – CEO
Founder of Aqua Sense and student of Electronics & Communication Engineering (ECE), Khulna University. Leads innovation, IoT and AI integration, and overall project strategy.

Fatima Karim Sunzana – CMO
Co-founder and graduate in Architecture. Oversees communication, design strategy, and stakeholder engagement to ensure farmer-friendly solutions.

Shiuli Chakma – CSO
Specialist in Soil, Water & Environment. Responsible for sustainability, environmental research, and developing eco-friendly aquaculture practices.
column27:
Aqua Sense is a smart aquaculture solution designed to help farmers maximize fish production through real-time monitoring, AI-powered recommendations, and sustainable practices.

The system integrates IoT-based water quality sensors, AI algorithms, and drone-assisted pond assessment to provide farmers with accurate, location-based insights. Through a mobile app and website, farmers receive:
	•	Real-time water quality data (pH, dissolved oxygen, temperature, turbidity).
	•	AI-driven fish stocking recommendations based on pond size, duration, and location.
	•	Feed optimization guidance, reducing overfeeding and costs.
	•	Drone-based aerial monitoring for pond health and surveillance.
	•	Profitability projections, enabling farmers to make informed decisions.

By turning underutilized ponds into productive farms, Aqua Sense ensures higher yields (up to 4,000 kg/ha vs. current 1,600 kg/ha), increased farmer income, and sustainable aquaculture practices.

This solution directly contributes to SDG 2 (Zero Hunger), SDG 12 (Responsible Consumption and Production), SDG 13 (Climate Action), and SDG 14 (Life Below Water), making it a scalable innovation for transforming aquaculture in Bangladesh.
column28:
Integrated Approach – Unlike existing solutions that focus only on water testing or feed calculation, Aqua Sense combines IoT sensors, AI models, and drone surveillance into a single ecosystem for aquaculture.
	•	Personalized, Data-Driven Guidance – Provides pond-specific recommendations for stocking density, fish species, feed, and medicines, rather than one-size-fits-all suggestions.
	•	Farmer-Centric Design – Through an easy-to-use mobile app and website, farmers receive step-by-step guidance in local language, ensuring inclusivity for rural users.
	•	Sustainability Built-In – Promotes responsible water use, reduced overfeeding, and lower environmental impact, ensuring both productivity and ecological balance.
	•	Scalability – Designed to be deployed district-wise across Bangladesh and adaptable for different fish species and aquaculture methods.
	•	SDG Alignment – Aqua Sense directly supports food security, climate resilience, and sustainable aquaculture, addressing both local challenges and global goals.

In short: Aqua Sense is unique because it transforms traditional fish farming into a technology-enabled, sustainable, and profitable practice, something no other single solution in Bangladesh currently offers.
column29:
1. IoT-Based Water Quality Monitoring
	•	Real-time tracking of pH, dissolved oxygen (DO), temperature, and turbidity.
	•	Automatic alerts when water quality goes beyond safe ranges.

2. AI-Powered Stocking & Feed Recommendation
	•	Calculates optimal fish stocking density based on pond size, duration, and location.
	•	Provides species-specific feeding schedules and quantities to reduce waste and cost.

3. Drone-Assisted Pond Assessment
	•	Aerial monitoring for pond health, algal growth, and water condition.
	•	Generates visual maps to detect anomalies and guide interventions.

4. Mobile App & Web Platform
	•	Simple interface for farmers with step-by-step guidance.
	•	Local language support for better accessibility.
	•	Displays data visualization, recommendations, and earnings projections.

5. Sustainability & Profitability Tools
	•	Ensures responsible aquaculture by minimizing environmental harm.
	•	Calculates potential income and ROI, empowering farmers to plan better.
column30:
Aqua Sense leverages cutting-edge technologies to transform aquaculture into a data-driven and sustainable practice:
	•	IoT Sensors: Continuous monitoring of key water parameters (pH, DO, temperature, turbidity) ensures real-time decision-making and early detection of risks.
	•	AI & Machine Learning: Algorithms analyze pond data to recommend optimal fish stocking density, feed schedules, and medicines, personalized for each farmer’s pond.
	•	Drone Technology: Aerial imagery provides insights into pond health, algal blooms, and water surface anomalies, reducing manual inspections.
	•	Mobile & Web Platforms: User-friendly apps deliver actionable insights in local language, making advanced technology accessible to rural farmers.
	•	Data Analytics: Collected data is stored and processed to generate trend analysis, yield forecasts, and profitability projections, supporting long-term planning.

By combining IoT, AI, drones, and data analytics in one integrated platform, Aqua Sense ensures that technology is applied with purpose, precision, and scalability, directly impacting farmer livelihoods and environmental sustainability.

column7: Cross Categories - R & D Project of the Year (CC-RD)
column8: Technology - AI Technology of the Year (CT-AI)
column25:
U.K. Enterprise is a established leader in Bangladesh's construction and infrastructure sector, with over a decade of experience executing national development projects. We are industry insiders who directly experience the critical skilled labor shortage that plagues Bangladesh's growth.

This firsthand understanding drives our commitment to the Jonoshokti project. We are not observers but active participants, investing our operational expertise, project sites for real-world testing, and guaranteed employment pathways for certified workers to solve this national crisis.

Our mission is to transform Bangladesh's human capital landscape by bridging the gap between workforce potential and industry needs, ensuring the nation's growth is built on a foundation of skilled, certified, and empowered citizens.
column26:
Our project brings together a unique blend of industry expertise and research talent.

AI/ML Specialists: Developing the National Skills Map and smart matching algorithms.

Blockchain Developers: Building the secure, decentralized "Skill Passport" credentialing system.

Cloud & Systems Architects: Ensuring the platform is robust, scalable, and can serve millions of users.

UI/UX Researchers: Designing an intuitive, user-friendly experience accessible to all citizens.

Project Management & Operations: A dedicated cross-functional team will manage the agile development process, stakeholder engagement, pilot deployments, and the eventual nationwide rollout, ensuring the project stays on time, within scope, and aligned with its strategic objectives.
column27:
Jono-shokti is a unified, digital national platform designed to transform Bangladesh's human capital ecosystem. It is a comprehensive solution that seamlessly connects the three key pillars of the workforce development lifecycle: Skills Development, Verification, and Employment.

The platform acts as a central nervous system for the nation's workforce. It starts by using advanced AI to analyze real-time data from job markets and industry trends, creating a dynamic "National Skills Map." This map informs the development of standardized, relevant training curricula. Citizens can then access these trainings and, upon completion, receive a "Skill Passport"—a blockchain-based digital wallet containing all their verifiable credentials. Finally, the platform’s intelligent matching engine uses this trusted data to connect certified individuals directly with employment opportunities in Bangladesh and abroad, creating a transparent, efficient, and fair job market.
column28:
Jonoshokti is Bangladesh's first and only fully integrated human capital platform. Our uniqueness lies in solving the entire ecosystem problem, not just one piece of it.

All-in-One Solution: We are the only platform that combines a National Skills Map, blockchain-based Skill Passport, and direct job matching in a single, trusted system.

Built on Trust, Not Paper: Our tamper-proof digital credentials eliminate fraud and create instant employer trust, unlike any paper certificate.

Proactive, Not Reactive: Our AI-powered National Skills Map anticipates future skill needs, ensuring training is always relevant. We don't just fill today's jobs; we build tomorrow's workforce.

Direct & Transparent: We cut out the exploitative middlemen, connecting certified workers directly to employers, which increases worker pay and national remittance.

We don't compete with job sites or training centers; we are the essential trust and intelligence layer that makes the entire ecosystem work efficiently for the first time.
column29:
The Jonoshokti platform will offer distinct, user-centric functionalities for its primary user groups:

For Job Seekers & Citizens:

Personalized Learning Dashboard: Access to standardized courses and training recommendations based on their career goals and market demand.

Digital Skill Passport: A secure, blockchain-based wallet to store and instantly share verifiable credentials, badges, and work history.

Smart Job Matching: An AI-powered engine that suggests relevant job opportunities, not just based on keywords, but on skill compatibility and career growth potential.

Career Pathway Planner: A tool to visualize and plan their career progression from a low-skilled to a high-skilled role.

Mobile-First Access: Full functionality available via smartphone and basic feature phones.

For Employers & Industries:

Access to a Vetted Talent Pool: Search and filter for candidates with specific, verified skills from the platform's database.

Instant Credential Verification: One-click verification of any candidate's "Skill Passport," eliminating background check costs and fraud.

Direct Hiring Platform: Post jobs, schedule interviews, and hire directly without intermediary fees.

Skills Demand Analytics: Access to anonymized, aggregated data from the National Skills Map for strategic workforce planning.

For Training Institutes & Partners:

Curriculum Development Toolkit: Resources and data to design and update industry-relevant training programs.

Digital Certification Module: Ability to issue verifiable digital certificates to their graduates directly onto the Jonoshokti platform.

Performance Tracking: Insights into the employment success of their graduates, allowing for continuous improvement.
column30:
The technological architecture of Jonoshokti is designed for security, scalability, and social impact.

Application of Cutting-Edge Technology: We are not using technology for its own sake, but applying it purposefully to solve core problems.

Blockchain: Used specifically to create an unforgeable, decentralized system of trust (the Skill Passport), solving the credential fraud problem.

Artificial Intelligence & Big Data Analytics: Used to process vast amounts of labor market information to generate the National Skills Map, moving the country from guesswork to data-driven planning.

Cloud-Native Architecture: Ensures the platform can scale reliably to serve millions of users across Bangladesh without performance degradation.

Quality Assurance:

Security-First Design: User data privacy and security are paramount. The system will adhere to international data protection standards.

Rigorous Testing: The platform will undergo extensive testing, including penetration testing for security, load testing for scalability, and extensive user acceptance testing (UAT) with our pilot groups.

This strategic application of robust technology ensures Jonoshokti is not a short-term app, but a reliable, high-quality national infrastructure that will serve Bangladesh for decades to come.
